title: Replace blind pick with something less horrible
body: Just want to know what the devs' stance on blind pick, is it ever going to be replaced or will it continue forever

replies.body:
The players ask for draft pick, but we won't get it. They say the server population is too small, but we want blind pick to be replaced.

They still don't care.

If you don't like it, don't play it. I myself i play ranked/flex 
If you don't play ranked or flex due to stress or w/e of such a serious game mode, play flex like it's normal draft, not many people take it seriously.

if flex is as casual as you say it is then ill give it a shot, ty for the insight. 
i just dont want to play bad and drag people down because i have twitch on the other monitor ya know?
think about all the times people let you down, it's nothing new lol
